column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi June - Thanks for your review. Although the bulk of our fare is ramen
column2: we do have quite a few non-ramen options such as the pork and chicken chashu bowls
column4: or an array of crowd-pleasing tapas dishes. For folks who consider our broth too salty
column5: I always suggest requesting less salt
column6: or modifying it however they see fit. And considering that your friends offered you "rave reviews" before your visit
column7: I suppose it's fair to say that sometimes expectation can become the cousin of disappointment. Regardless
column8: we appreciate your trying us out at least twice before posting your review.
